QuestData.Title: Grimrail Depot
QuestData.Description: We must move quickly, commander. As we speak the Grimrail is preparing to depart Grimrail Depot to deliver a massive battalion of troops to Shattrath. Rumor has it that they have outfitted the train with a weapon strong enough to shatter the shield protecting the inner city.$B$BSkylord Tovra has taken to guarding the train on its journey to Talador. You must stop Tovra and the Grimrail before it reaches Shattrath!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Skylord Tovra in Grimrail Depot.
